33 template<typename id_t>
34 PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::PiercedKernelRange()
35  : m_cbegin(),
36  m_cend()
37 {
38 }
39 
45 template<typename id_t>
46 PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::PiercedKernelRange(const kernel_t *kernel)
47 {
48  initialize(kernel);
49 }
50 
58 template<typename id_t>
59 PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::PiercedKernelRange(const kernel_t *kernel, id_t first, id_t last)
60 {
61  initialize(kernel, first, last);
62 }
63 
70 template<typename id_t>
71 PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::PiercedKernelRange(const const_iterator &begin, const const_iterator &end)
72 {
73  initialize(begin, end);
74 }
75 
81 template<typename id_t>
82 void PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::initialize(const kernel_t *kernel)
83 {
84  m_cbegin = kernel->cbegin();
85  m_cend = kernel->cend();
86 }
87 
95 template<typename id_t>
96 void PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::initialize(const kernel_t *kernel, id_t first, id_t last)
97 {
98  m_cbegin = kernel->find(first);
99  m_cend = ++(kernel->find(last));
100 }
101 
108 template<typename id_t>
109 void PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::initialize(const const_iterator &begin, const const_iterator &end)
110 {
111  if (&(begin.getKernel()) != &(end.getKernel())) {
112  throw std::runtime_error("The two iterators belong to different kernels");
113  }
114 
115  m_cbegin = begin;
116  m_cend = end;
117 }
118 
124 template<typename id_t>
125 void PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::swap(PiercedKernelRange &other) noexcept
126 {
127  std::swap(m_cbegin, other.m_cbegin);
128  std::swap(m_cend, other.m_cend);
129 }
130 
136 template<typename id_t>
137 std::size_t PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::evalSize() const
138 {
139  const PiercedKernel<id_t> &kernel = m_cbegin.getKernel();
140 
141  std::size_t flatBegin = kernel.evalFlatIndex(m_cbegin.getId());
142 
143  std::size_t flatEnd;
144  if (m_cend.getPos() <= kernel.getLastUsedPos()) {
145  flatEnd = kernel.evalFlatIndex(m_cend.getId()) + 1;
146  } else {
147  flatEnd = kernel.size();
148  }
149 
150  std::size_t size = (flatEnd - flatBegin);
151 
152  return size;
153 }
154 
160 template<typename id_t>
161 typename PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::const_iterator PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::begin() const noexcept
162 {
163  return m_cbegin;
164 }
165 
173 template<typename id_t>
174 typename PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::const_iterator PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::end() const noexcept
175 {
176  return m_cend;
177 }
178 
184 template<typename id_t>
185 typename PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::const_iterator PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::cbegin() const noexcept
186 {
187  return m_cbegin;
188 }
189 
197 template<typename id_t>
198 typename PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::const_iterator PiercedKernelRange<id_t>::cend() const noexcept
199 {
200  return m_cend;
201 }
202 
203 }
